description:
40 YEARS OF QUALITY LEGAL SERVICE TO NORTH CAROLINA

DeMent Askew & Johnson enjoys an established reputation for unwavering trial advocacy. Our Raleigh law firm now boasts five attorneys supported by an exceptionally experienced staff of professionals. We provide a full spectrum of legal services to protect clients’ rights in an array of civil and criminal matters in North Carolina’s state and federal courts.

Our criminal defense team has decades of experience successfully defending those accused of felonies and misdemeanors in North Carolina’s state and federal courts. We are committed to aggressively defending our clients’ rights.

Our civil and personal injury representation has resulted in a successful history of substantial verdicts and settlements for catastrophic injury victims as well as for those injured financially by the actions of other people due to wrong-doing. We are experienced trial lawyers and dedicated advocates, representing clients in a variety of civil cases, including jury and non-jury trials in state and federal trial and appellate courts.

The Raleigh Law Firm of DeMent Askew & Johnson is an established fixture in the downtown Raleigh community. Our offices are located on the top floor of the Capital Bank Building, just across Fayetteville Street from the Wake County Courthouse.
